snippet.title: Stand-Alone – Gameplay Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Stand-Alone on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2226730/STANDALONE/

Stand-Alone is a 2D roguelite action platformer game. A world inhabited by athro, a robot that lost everything along with its memories due to an explosion at the center, is the only one left and wants to carry on its beliefs.

#gaming #indiegames
Best Upcoming Indie Game Trailers
